Paper.Title: Enhancing a large scale dictionary with a two-level system

Section.Paragraph: We tested this transducer on a 1,300,000 words corpus containing 58,000 different graphical forms. Our transducer analyzed 75% of these graphical forms, which is 3% more that the transducer of DELAF alone, at a speed of 1,100 words per second. Hence, more than 97% of the word occurrences of our corpus have been analyzed in the following way: algorithmisation ~ algorithme,N*iser,V*Ation,N* f*.s
